interestingFacts: India is the world's largest democracy and has over 22 official languages.
Japan is home to the world's oldest company, Kongō Gumi, founded in 578 AD.
Brazil is the largest producer of coffee in the world.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.
Egypt is home to the only remaining ancient wonder of the world — the Great Pyramid of Giza.
Germany is known for its engineering and is the birthplace of the automobile.
France is the most visited country in the world by tourists.
The U.S. has no official language at the federal level.
